Definitely play the first Portal game for the story if you wanna catch up on that. If you start with this one, it is a great start with puzzle solving. There are some cool easter eggs and lore secrets within the game, so be on the lookout for them!

This is one of my favorite games of all time, and probably my absolute favorite puzzle game. To be honest, I think everyone should play this game. I played it back on the Xbox 360 and now I'm playing it here. The storyline is amazing, the humor is actually great, and of course the puzzles are engaging and just the right amount of challenging. If you haven't played this game, what are you even doing, go play it.
A must-have for anyone's Steam Library. An incredibly solid, yet quite short, puzzle game. Do you really have a Steam account if you don't have Portal?
